statements: SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 20;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity >= 100 AND price < 200 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM farm_produce_inventory;
SELECT produce_name, quantity FROM farm_produce_inventory WHERE price > 10.00;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_produce_inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT customer_name, produce_name, order_quantity FROM orders WHERE order_quantity >= 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, produce_name DESC;
SELECT produce_name, quantity FROM farm_produce_inventory WHERE price > 5.00 ORDER BY produce_name DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_name, produce_id, order_quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT produce_name, price FROM farm_produce_inventory WHERE quantity < 1000 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM farm_produce_inventory JOIN orders ON farm_produce_inventory.produce_id = orders.produce_id WHERE order_quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_quantity DESC, price ASC
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT order_id, product_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity_ordered > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM suppliers JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT orders.order_id, product_name, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.product_id = inventory.id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person='John Doe';
SELECT id, customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT transaction_date, total_price FROM Transactions WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, category, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers WHERE LENGTH(contact_number) > 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity DESC, unit_price ASC;
